#summary Features

=== Compatibility ===

* The current version is working with Honda chipped ECUs: *

 * Ectune
 * Crome 1.4+
 * NG62

* Under developpement: *

 * AEM EMS
 * MOTEC 

=== Features ===

 * Real time dataloging
 * Shift Light
 * Buzzer (overheating alarm...)
 * Analog Sensors: oil temp & pressure
 * Serial Relay. (you can still use you laptop to datalog the ecu by connection to the module)
